casebody.data:
ROBERTSON
v.
ROBERTSON. No. 1P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 1, 2008. Theodore M. Molitoris, Winston-Salem, for Theresa Robertson.

*664The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 31st day of January 2008 by Defendant to Withdraw Petition:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 1st day of February 2008."
